list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore: integrate Supabase library and update configurations
- Added `supabase` dependency in `package.json` and `package-lock.json`. - Adjusted `supabase/config.toml` and `.idea/dataSources.xml` with updated connection settings (ports). - Refactored Supabase client initialization to include enhanced token management and development guards. - Fixed `/login` page to handle asynchronous `searchParams` for improved compatibility.

task.summary:
docs: streamline DOCS_AUDIT_REPORT to remove redundancies and outdated entries
- Consolidated detailed file audit into a high-level documentation mapping. - Removed obsolete sections and unnecessary data structures. - Identified duplicate content and recommended unified architecture documentation. - Updated future action plans with emphasis on ADR adoption and new onboarding runbook creation. - Introduced a PROJECT_IMMERSION_REPORT to assist with developer onboarding and project understanding.

docs: add link integrity report and update DOCS_RESTRUCTURE_SUMMARY
- Added DOCS_LINK_CHECK.md documenting the manual verification of internal links with no issues found. - Enhanced DOCS_RESTRUCTURE_SUMMARY.md with detailed updates on docs/README.md, MODULE_STATUS.md, and the creation of docs/process/ai/. - Clarified the purpose of docs/process/ai/README.md and its association with AI workflow practices. - Noted missing files (e.g., CODEX_GUIDE.md, AI_TOOLING.md) and their impact on the planned reorganization.

docs: consolidate architecture documentation and remove deprecated files
- Merged relevant content from REPO_MAP.md and ARCHITECTURE_REAL.md into SYSTEM_ARCHITECTURE.md as the new canonical source. - Removed redundant files: REPO_MAP.md and ARCHITECTURE_REAL.md. - Simplified folder structure documentation for improved readability and accessibility.

docs: expand critical questions and add onboarding guide
- Renamed CODEX_QUESTIONS.md to "Perguntas de Arquitetura e Negócio" with improved structure and detailed guidelines for proposing, tracking, and resolving questions. - Added new sections covering key unanswered questions about Escalas, Auditoria, Segurança, and Schema. - Introduced an ONBOARDING.md guide detailing project setup, governance, and anti-patterns to streamline new developer integration.

docs: add quality assurance and historical reference documentation
- Introduced `docs/reviews/README.md` to outline the purpose of quality assurance artifacts like PR reviews, audits, and restructuring summaries. - Added `docs/repo_antigo/README.md` to provide clear guidelines on the use of legacy repository files for historical reference only. - Updated `docs/runbooks/pacientes-aba01-troubleshooting.md` with a disclaimer to clarify its historical context and include links to current canonical guides.

docs: consolidate architecture documentation
- Merged content from REPO_MAP.md and ARCHITECTURE_REAL.md into SYSTEM_ARCHITECTURE.md. - Removed deprecated files (REPO_MAP.md, ARCHITECTURE_REAL.md). - Streamlined references to unified architecture documentation for clarity and maintenance.
chore: add .idea database configuration files for PostgreSQL connection
chore: update `.idea/workspace.xml` to reflect PostgreSQL configuration changes

chore: integrate Supabase library and update configurations
- Added `supabase` dependency in `package.json` and `package-lock.json`. - Adjusted `supabase/config.toml` and `.idea/dataSources.xml` with updated connection settings (ports). - Refactored Supabase client initialization to include enhanced token management and development guards. - Fixed `/login` page to handle asynchronous `searchParams` for improved compatibility.
